column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Thank you for your valuable feedback of your visit to Jinya Ramen Bar.  I do apologize for you having to wait for so long on your visit.  Since opening here in Midtown
column2: we've been extremely busy and we're making adjustments each and every day for our kitchen to handle the business load.  Since your visit
column3: we've made multiple adjustments to our seating procedure and our speed of service on the line.  We hope you give Jinya Ramen Bar another visit soon and see for yourself if we have improved to meet your expectations.
